05106.mean:
1. a suffix when attached to a noun, an adjective or a verb denoting the feminine gender. 2. a suffix when attached to a verb root make it infinitive.

१. नाम, विशेषण र क्रियापद शब्दको पछाडि आई स्त्रीलिङ्ग बोध गराउने प्रत्यय । २. धातुको पछाडि जोडिएर धातुको क्रियारूप बुझाउने प्रत्यय ।

05107.mean:
a kind of ancient Limbu ornament; garland of earthen/clay beads.

लिम्बुजातिको एक प्रकारको प्राचिन गहना; माटोको गेडाको माला ।

05108.mean:
blood relation (from maternal side).

दूदको वा रगतको नाता (आमापट्टीबाट) ।

05110.mean:
except; even; without; exclusive of.

बाहेक; विना; बाहेक पनि; नभए पनि ।

05111.mean:
1. to speak a lie; to lie/trick/deceive. 2. to keep secret; to conceal; to withhold matters.

१. ढाँट्नु; छल्नु; झुटो बोल्नु । २. गुप्त राख्नु; कुरा लुकाउनु ।

05112.mean:
a woman who failing to be well versed in the lore or profession or Yema happens a haunt her own family members.

येमाको विद्यामा पारङ्गत हुनु नसकि अधकल्चो भएकी स्त्री जो आफ्नै परिवार भित्र पिरोल्ने गर्छे ।

05113.mean:
to be hidden/concealed/kept secret (oneself).

गोप्य राख्नु; गुप्त राख्नु ।

05116.mean:
brown; of brown color; brownish.

खैरो; खैरो रङ्गको ।

05118.mean:
cloudiness; cloudy weather/day; an overcast sky.

बादलु (दिन); बादलले ढाकेको आकाश ।

05119.mean:
(adj.) dim; dull; murky; muddy. (n.) filtered beer.

(क्रिवि.) धमिलो । (ना.) छानेको जाँड ।

05122.mean:
vein; artery; nerve; sinew.

नसो; नाडी; रक्तवाहिनी तन्तु ।

05125.mean:
damp; damp and wet; marshy.

सेपिलो; चिसो; भिजेको ।

05127.mean:
[Phedape] firebrand; piece of burning wood.

[फेदापे] अगुल्टो ।

05129.mean:
dusk; twilight.

झमक्क अँध्यारो हुन लागेको साँझ; झिसमिसे अन्धकार ।

05130.mean:
(of body) to be(come)/go black; to be dirty/defiled/filthy.

कालो हुनु (शरीर); फोहोर वा मैलो पर्नु ।

05136.mean:
vein.

मुटुमा फोहोर रगत प्रबाह गराउने नसा; धमनी ।

05138.mean:
to see (denoting ‘to dream’) a dream; to dream.

(सपना देख्ने अर्थमा) पाउनु; सपना देख्नु ।

05140.mean:
a kind of wild plant; the white pith of its stem is extracted to make an ornament called Suti which is offered while wordhiping Him-sammang and Yuma.

हिम साम्माङ् पूजामा प्रयोग गरिने एक प्रकारको जङ्गली बोट जसको डाठबाट सेतो गुदि निकालेर सुति नामक गहना बनाइन्छ ।

05143.mean:
one of the Yoginis or evil stars.

संकटा (योगिनी) ।

05145.mean:
blackness; dark(ness); utter darkness; the pitch dark.

कालोपना; अँध्यारो; निस्पट्ट अँध्यारो ।

05150.mean:
a dog described in Limbu Mundhum.

मुन्धुममा वर्णित एक कुकुर ।

05152.mean:
seeds of a creeper, its hair causes itching. Mucuna macrocarpa.

बल्ड्याङ्ग्रो (वनस्पति) ।

05153.mean:
1. daughters (sisters). 2. a customs of worshiping Gods/deities for one’s welfare, peace, prosperity and protection.

१. चेलीबेटी (दिदी बहिनी) । २. व्यक्तिबिशेषको ग्रहजप वा शान्तिस्वस्तिको लागि वा शिर उठाउनको लागि गरिने अनुष्ठान ।

05154.mean:
place of origin (birth place) of Limbu tribes.

लिम्बूको कुलविशेषको उत्पत्ति/उद्गमस्थल ।

05158.mean:
1. [Phedape] to cry (half) wildly; to rant and rave. 2. to invoke a God (for the fulfillment of a particular wish); to call upon a God in prayer/worship. 3. to ward off/exorcise evil spirits or ghosts.

१. [फेदापे] अचेत। विचेत हुने गरी कराउनु; चिच्याउनु । २. देवताको पुकार गर्नु; पूजा आराधना गर्नु । ३. भूतप्रेत मन्साउनु ।

05161.mean:
the act of Limbu. priests binding their bodies through incantations before worshipping or performing some rites; vow; oath; pormise.

लिम्बू पुरोहितहरूले पूजाआजा (अनुष्ठान) गर्नुअघि आफ्नो जीउ मन्त्रद्वारा बाँध्न गरिने क्रिया वाचा ।

05162.mean:
1. to perform/worship for sb. 2. to exorcise evil spirits from someone’s body; to conduct a ritual to drive out/expel an evil sprits from someone’s body.

१. उपकार गरिदिनु; अर्काको लागि देवताको पुकार गरिदिनु । २. अर्काको जीउबाट खराब भूतप्रेत झारिदिनु ।

05164.mean:
special oblation/offerings to God.

नैवेद; नैवेद्य; देवतालाई चढाइने वा चढाइएको खाद्य। पदार्थ ।

05165.mean:
one(s) who assist(s) the priest in preparing prayer/worship materials.

पूजा आराधना गर्दा पूजासामग्री तयार पार्न सहयोग गर्ने वा गर्नेहरू; पूजारीका साथी (हरू) ।

05167.mean:
an evil spirit which enters into the eye of sb and makes what (s)he sees inauspicious/ill-fated/ill-starved.

मानिसको नजर (दृष्टि) मा वास गर्ने र उसको नजरलाई अपशकुन वा अशुभ बनाइदिने दुरात्मा ।

05168.mean:
1. millet. Eleusine. 2. [Phedape/Tamor] meal, mush (of millet flour)/Eleusine.

१. कोदो । २. [फेदापे/तमर] (कोदोको) ढिंडो ।

05169.mean:
basket, etc of split cane/reed/bamboo.

चोयाको डेली, पेटारो आदि ।

05170.mean:
a particular class of Limbu priests; a priest (of lower status).

लिम्बू पुरोहितको एक वर्ग विशेष; पूजारी ।

05173.mean:
one who believes in God and religion.

आस्तिक ।

05174.mean:
making a vow to God or deities to get one’s desire(s) fulfilled.

भाकल ।

05176.mean:
to make a vow before a God/deity to get one’s desire(s) fulfilled.

भाकल गर्नु ।

05178.mean:
primordial age; mythological period.

मान्छे र देवता नछुट्टिएको आदिम काल; पौराणिक काल ।

05179.mean:
1. vulgar/abusive/obscene language; abuse. 2. God’s words; oracle; commandment.

१. अपशब्द; अश्लील भाषा । २. देववाणी ।

05183.mean:
(n.) die-hard; fanatic; zealot. (adj.) dogmatic; orthodox; bigoted.

(ना.) कट्टरपन्थी । (वि.) कट्टर ।

05184.mean:
water cock; a kind of wild cock; it lives in marshy land. Gallicrex Cinerea.

सिमकुखुरा ।

05186.mean:
a kind of small leopard; cat-bear.

निगाले चितुवा ।

05190.mean:
an inch; a measurement of one inch.

इन्च; एक इन्चको नापो ।

05192.mean:
lamp and incense, etc burnt in the name of a God/deity during worship.

धूप वत्ती; देवताको नाममा वा पूजामा बालिने दियो ।

05193.mean:
1. King of God; Primordial God; God of Gods; Lord of Lords; Supreme God; the Lord God. 2. the Lord Shiva; Lord Kirenteshwar (Supreme God of Kirants)

१. देवताको राजा; देवाधिदेव । २. महादेव; किराँतेश्वर महादेव ।

05195.mean:
1. swearing by a god (for ill purpose); such swearing. 2. solemn promise; swearing by God.

१. देवता पुकारेर (नराम्रो) किरिया खाने काम; त्यसरी गरिने वाचा बन्धन । २. भाकल; वाचा बन्धन ।

05196.mean:
1. solemn promise; swearing by God. 2. oath; swearing; pledge; vow.

१. भाकल । २. किरिया; प्रतिज्ञा ।

05200.mean:
1. original place; place of origin; birth place; motherland; fatherland. 2. one of the Limbu family/clan names.

१. मूलथलो; जन्मभूमि; मातृभूमि; पितृभूमि । २. लिम्बूजातिको थरविशेष ।

05201.mean:
pet or pin of a handmill stone.

मानी; जाँतोको तल्लो भागको बीचमा गाडिएको कीलो ।

05203.mean:
1. reviving (resuscitating; revitalizing). 2. one of the Limbu clan/family names.

१. पुनर्जिवित हुने; फेरिफेरि बाँच्ने । २. लिम्बूजातिको एउटा थर ।

05205.mean:
1. mother; third person address term for the mother. 2. mother-in-law.

१. आमा; आमालाई तृतिय पुरुषमा भनिने/सम्बोधन गरिने शब्द । २. सासू ।

05206.mean:
hi, little lady/girl; address term for a little girl.

ए नानी; सानो केटीलाई गरिने सम्बोधन ।

05207.mean:
illicit pregnancy; illegal conception/foetus (or embryo); pregnancy of a bastard child; pregnancy of former husband or beloved during elopement.

पोइल आउँदा/जाँदा रहेको अघिल्लो लोग्ने वा परपुरुषको गर्भ; झड्केलो गर्भ (भ्रुण) ।

05210.mean:
a kind of garland of clay beads; it was in vogue among the ancient Kirants.

प्राचीन कालमा किरात जातिमा प्रचलित माटोको गेडाको बहुमुल्य मालाविशेष ।

05212.mean:
1. main road; big road. 2. highway.

१. मूलबाटो; ठूलो बाटो । २. राजमार्ग ।

05213.mean:
1. utmost; to the best of one’s ability; leaving no stone unturned. 2. knowingly.

१. मरिमेटेर; मरेर; मर्ने गरी; कुनै कसर नराखी । २. जानी जानी/ थाहा हुँदाहुँदै ।

05215.mean:
talking mynah; merie; starling; Hill Grackle. Gracula religiosa.

मैना ।

05217.mean:
mythical place where the creation of human beings took place.

मान्छेको उत्पत्तिस्थल ।

05218.mean:
a kind of tree with milky white flowers and brittle branches. Careya herbacea and CLerodendron serrata.

चुवा (फुल) ।

05219.mean:
a kind of Magpie; Robin dayal. Copsychus saularis.

धोबिनी चरो ।

05220.mean:
a kind of green frog found in marshy place.

सिमतिर पाइने सानाो खालको पाहा ।

05221.mean:
a weed of paddy which resembles paddy plants.

सामा; धानबालीमा उम्रने र धानको बोट जस्तै देखिने एक प्रकारको घाँस ।

05225.mean:
a kind of oak tree. Quercus lineata.

फलाँटको रूख ।

05228.mean:
crocus, a kind of flower. Zephranthus sp.

कुंकुम, एक प्रकारको प्याजी फूल ।

05230.mean:
a kind of nettle. Girardinia heterophylla.

अल्लो; भाङ्ग्र् सिस्नु ।

05233.mean:
located at a distance; far-off; distant; remote; of far away.

टाढाको; दुर रहेको; सुदूरस्थित; दूरस्थ ।

05239.mean:
1. to be far away. 2. (of cattle) to cry/moo; (of sheep, goat etc) to bleat.

१. टाढा हुनु । २. (गाईबस्तु) चटारिनु/चटारिएर (भेडा, बाख्रा) कराउनु ।

05241.mean:
a custom of making obeisance with presents by son-in-law to the mother-in-law on the first meeting.

सासूसितको प्रथम भेटमा ज्वाइँबाट चढाइने ढोग दस्तुर ।

05243.mean:
step-mother senior to one’s own mother.

सौतेनी जेठीआमा; आफ्नी आमा भन्दा नातामा जेठी सौतेनी आमा ।

05244.mean:
soup; coarse soup of millet flour or Elusine.

कोदोको खोले ।

05246.mean:
junior or younger step-mother; step-mother junior to one’s own mother.

सौतेनी कान्छी आमा; आफ्नी आमाभन्दा नातामा कान्छी सौतेनी आमा; झड्केली आमा ।

05248.mean:
1. to be lost. 2. to be invisible; not to be seen; not to come into view.

१. हराउनु; हराइजानु । २. अलमलिनु (कतै अलमलिएर नदेखिनु) ।

05251.mean:
1. to finish sth completely. 2. to spend money completely.

१. टाकटुक सक्नु/सिद्ध्याउनु; निमिट्यान्न/निर्मुल पार्नु । २. खर्च गरिसक्नु ।

05253.mean:
1. to die; to be deceased; to pass away. 2. to vanish/disappear. 3. to become ineffective.

१. देहान्त हुनु; स्वर्गवास हुनु । २. अल्पनु; हराउदै जानु; बिलाउनु; लोप हुनु । ३. अप्रभावी हुनु ।
